name: Verify Installed apps details info via API
description:
### Pre-conditions:
- PostgreSQL app installed.

### Steps:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Call `instances` API.

### Verify that:

- API response contains valid data.
descriptionHtml:
Pre-conditions:

  • PostgreSQL app installed.

Steps:

  • Call instances API.

Verify that:

  • API response contains valid data.
